snippet: BRAUN--Sandra, of Huntington, NY passed away on March 26, 2016 at the age of 87. Sandra was born in Brooklyn, NY to the late David and Ethel (Katz) Holman. She is survived by her loving sons, Tony and Jimmy (Kathie), brother Gary (Joan) Holman, five grandchildren; Jennifer, Derek, Lindsay, Danny and Emily and four great-grandchildren. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BRAUN--Sandra, of Huntington, NY passed away on March 26, 2016 at the age of 87. Sandra was born in Brooklyn, NY to the late David and Ethel (Katz) Holman. She is survived by her loving sons, Tony and Jimmy (Kathie), brother Gary (Joan) Holman, five grandchildren; Jennifer, Derek, Lindsay, Danny and Emily and four great-grandchildren. 1/3
